data.name: Last Monarch Demo
data.detailed_description:
Last Monarch is a Roguelite action shooting game. You will play the role of the Last Devil, the savior of demons, responsible for the survival and continuation of the demon race. You will leave your castle bravely, and set foot on the battlefield to find your way to survive. Use your special abilities to capture different tribes, personalities and traits to assist your character to protect the demons.



【WASD】 Move
【LMB】 Normal Attack
【RMB】 magic shield
【F】 Interact/open
【Space】 sprint
【E】 Block skill (need to be unlocked)
【R】 Blessing (need to be unlocked)
【Q】 place a item



1. You can get a lot of items, from which you can stack the buff, to upgrade your skills and abilities. 【Create your own builds】



2. Great and smooth combat. You can dodge all the attacks by using sprint and then perform a counterattack.



3. Anything could happen during the adventure. You might encounter various rooms, events and NPC which might increase your abilities or make you cursed by interacting with them.

4. Create an ambiguous and engaging story between three main characters. What request do they have ? or is there anything you would like to do with them? Explore it by yourself.

5. Activate Infinity challenge mode after completing campaign. There are more random events and enemies.【For gamers who like to challenge】

6. It has not only many different stages but also vivid graphics in the game. As you traverse the game’s environment, some of objects are interactive and destructible. You might get items from those destructible objects.

data.short_description: You are the Demon Lord Kuro on a mission to protect demonkind. Use your abilities to capture and ensnare others. Tumble with different personalities in this 2D rogue-lite shooter!
